Specimen Type: Throat swabs, nasopharyngeal swabs, respiratory aspirates, bronchoalveolar lavage, stool samples, urine samples
Purpose: To qualitatively detect Adenovirus DNA in human clinical specimens for diagnostic purposes.
Container: Appropriate sterile transport media for swabs or sterile leak-proof containers for stool and urine
Equipment: Thermal cycler (PCR machine), microcentrifuge, vortex mixer, pipettes with filtered tips
